alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:29PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Madison and east central Gallatin Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 628 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles south of Bozeman, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Sky. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 314 and 321. Highway 191 between mile markers 43 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for south central and southwestern Montana.
